typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string
}
source(output(
		user_id as string,
		category_type as string,
		effective_start as string,
		effective_end as string,
		base_icao_code as string,
		base_iata_code as string,
		base_faa_code as string,
		base_name as string,
		equipment_group_name as string,
		equipment_group_code as string,
		position_name as string,
		position_code as string,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SFFlightCrew
SFFlightCrew derive(ADF_TIMESTAMP = currentTimestamp(),
		RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddWrkflwIDandTS
AddWrkflwIDandTS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FLIGHTCREWtoSQL
